uploader.text: Drag and drop your files here

deletePage.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this page?

info.bleedAreaText: This area will be trimmed. Make sure all background graphics cover this area.
info.productSizeText: This is the final size your artwork will be trimmed to.

rules.text: Your artwork must be in {{COLORSPACE}} color space and its resolution should be at least {{DPI}} dpi.

messages.notFillTrimbox: The design does not fill the entire TrimBox
messages.notInsideBleedbox: The design does not fit the BleedBox
messages.safetyboxes: Required page boxes are not defined or do not match - {{BOXES}}
messages.sameorientation: The page has a different orientation than most pages
messages.fonttypes: These font types are not allowed - {{FONTTYPES}}
messages.minfontsize: These text size values are less than allowed - {{FONTSIZES}}
messages.textascurves: Text is not converted to curves
messages.embeddedfonts: These fonts are not embedded in document - {{FONTS}}
